p: The COX enzymatic inhibition activity of G. curviflora EO was accomplished using Cayman Chemical ELISA kit no. 560131. The calculated inhibition percentage of COX-2 for the tested EO revealed inhibition activity of 98.4% and 99.5% at concentrations of 0.25 μg/mL and 0.5 μg/mL, respectively. Similar results were obtained for the inhibition of COX-1, where the inhibition was 98% and 99% for the two tested concentrations, respectively. The results revealed that the G. curviflora EO demonstrated a potent but nonselective inhibitory activity towards both COX-2 and COX-1 enzymes.
